price: Kwani Mwenyezi Mungu si muadilifu kuliko mahakimu wote?
footnotes: Kwani Mwenyezi Mungu aliye yatenda hayo tuliyo kueleza si muadilifu kuliko mahakimu wote kwa kufanya na kupanga?

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
